programme.desc: Pada hari perkahwinannya, Dinda teragak-agak kerana dia akan berkahwin dengan orang yang tidak dicintainya. Namun, satu kejadian berlaku dan menyebabkan Dinda mengalami amnesia separa.

programme.title: Pok Ya Cong Codei Memburu Siti - EP 12
programme.desc: Selepas ditinggalkan Siti, Pok Ya tidak berhasrat untuk mencarinya sehinggalah mendapat tahu Siti sedang mengandungkan anaknya. Misi menjejaki Siti semakin tegang setelah mengetahui dia sebenarnya diculik!

programme.title: Kidsnowadays - EP 5
programme.desc: Seorang bapa mengejar impiannya untuk menggenggam segulung ijazah walaupun mendapat tentangan hebat dari anak sulungnya. Pelbagai cabaran dihadapi sepanjang menjadi pelajar universiti yang sudah berusia.

programme.title: Harta Karun Tok Kie
programme.desc: Kisah pasangan Adik beradik Lyssa dan Rauf yang terpaksa mencari jejak datuknya yang menderita Alzhemeir sehari sebelum Hari Raya Aidilfitri.

programme.title: Pung Pang Rizalman Edisi Raya 2
programme.desc: Dalam Pung Pang Rizalman Edisi Raya 2, Dato Rizalman dan Raja Azura bersama dengan rakan-rakan selebriti iaitu Rozita Che Wan, Dayang Nurfaizah dan Abang Gee akan menyediakan juadah Hari Raya.

programme.title: Pengantin Tangkap Muat
programme.desc: Arif dan Mazwin berkahwin dalam keadaan mengejut apabila mereka dikahwinkan tanpa perancangan. Mereka dijadikan pengantin ganti saat akhir kerana Harishah dan Natasha melarikan diri malam akad nikah.

programme.title: Reporting For Duty
programme.desc: Tiga sekawan: Amelia Henderson, Tisya Ong dan Aisha Retno menyahut cabaran untuk merasai sendiri pengalaman individu yang tidak dapat menyambut Syawal dengan orang tersayang demi memenuhi tugas mereka.

programme.title: Wira
programme.desc: Seorang pegawai tentera pulang untuk mengatasi kejahatannya dengan memasuki perlawanan MMA berdepan anak-anak seorang lelaki yang telah bertahun lama menyeksa keluarganya.

programme.title: Impiana S3 - EP 5
programme.desc: Impiana musim ke-3 ini berkonsepkan tentang "Dekorasi Homestay Impiana" menampilkan dua buah rumah yang memberi inspirasi kepada penonton dan dihoskan oleh Fiza Frizzy.

programme.title: Battle Geng
programme.desc: Permainan maya yang menyeronokkan & menarik untuk selebriti dan keluarga mereka semasa lockdown di rumah. Dua pasukan akan bertanding untuk menjadi pemenang.

programme.title: Bintang Minggu Ini SR 2 - EP 10

programme.title: Romantika Raya 2022 - EP 1
programme.desc: Penampilan khas pasangan selebriti terkenal tanah air berkongsi kisah cinta mereka si sebalik lensa kamera.

programme.title: Dapur Hancur Lebur - EP 4

programme.title: CacaMarba Glamor Raya
programme.desc: Kita pernah kagum melihat kesungguhan mereka mempelajari bahasa ibunda kita. Apa pula akan terjadi, bila kita kumpulkan mereka semua untuk berhari raya? Pastinya cacamarba!

programme.title: Hantu Raya

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: ETHIRNEECHAL THODARGIRADHU
programme.desc: Urged by her father, Janani is always a high achiever. But her marriage into a patriarchal family dashes her dream of a career. Thus begins Janani's arduous journey towards empowering her family's oppressed women to unleash their power.

programme.title: Ranjani
programme.desc: Raised in a strict home, Ranjani found happiness solely in the company of four boys from her neighbourhood. As she grew up, their friendship meant the world to her. Can she find love while upholding their close bonds amidst family and social constraints?

programme.title: Malli
programme.desc: Things take a momentous shift when a bold & loving village girl, Malli, crosses paths with a doting father and his 6-year-old daughter who yearns for a mother's love. Join the family's journey through the nuances of love, affection & parenthood.

programme.title: Malar - Serial
programme.desc: Though not siblings by birth, Parvathi means the world to her warm-hearted sister Malar. While Malar's ultimate wish is to find the perfect life partner & a happily-ever-after life for Paravathi, what is destiny's plan for them?

programme.title: Puthu Paattu

programme.title: Comedy Galatta

programme.title: Hit Thirai - Sigaram
programme.desc: Enjoy your day by tuning in to Vannathirai. We bring you a wide variety of Tamil movies for the whole family to watch.

programme.title: Movie - Nanbargal - EP 1
programme.desc: Priya, an arrogant rich girl quarrels with Vijay in several instances. Later, she falls in love with him when he saves her from a danger. But, her father intends to break their relationship.

programme.title: Movie - Maniyar Kudumbam - EP 1
programme.desc: About the rise and fall of a family narrated in comical manner.

programme.title: Movie - Manjapai - EP 1
programme.desc: An aged villager comes to the city and sets people right.

programme.title: Movie - Palaivanathil Yaanai - EP 1
programme.desc: Arun Vijay,Priya Bhavani Shankar,Ramachandra Raju,Samuthirakani,Radhika Sarathkumar,Ammu Abhirami,Yogi Babu

programme.title: Movie- Mr & Mrs Arjun - EP 1
programme.desc: A man and woman have been neighbors since they were children, but they have different perspectives on their relationship.

programme.title: Movie- Kabadadaari - EP 1
programme.desc: A passionate traffic police who is bored of his routine job stumbles across some skeletons which ignite his soulless life. When he probes into the case he comes across a cop who had investigated the case in the past.

programme.title: Movie - Queen - EP 1
programme.desc: A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets cancelled.

programme.title: Movie - Ivan Kavalkaran - EP 1
programme.desc: Ivan Kavalkaran is the story of Vijay (Bellamkonda Srinivas) a sincere and dynamic police officer who gets stuck in a kidnap case which turns his life upside down as the entire department and society turns against him. He has 24 hours to prove his innocence and get back to his respectable life. Will he be able to do that?

programme.title: Movie - Dhuruvangal Pathinaaru - EP 1
programme.desc: A police officer retires after an accident during a case investigation. Years later, he is forced to relive the past as he narrates the story to his friend's son.

programme.title: Movie - Virupaksha - EP 1
programme.desc: When a man visits his ancestral village, where terror reigns after a chain of unexplained deaths, he must unravel mystical secrets before it's too late.

programme.title: Movie - Guruthandha Sithkalam - EP 1
programme.desc: The film is set against an urban backdrop and Satya Dev will be stepping into the shoes of a middle-aged software employee who has endured several heartbreaks in his quest to find true love.

programme.title: Movie - James & Alice - EP 1
programme.desc: James and Alice marry against their parent's wishes and the movie revolves around the misunderstandings between them caused by their busy lifestyles. Things take a turn when James meets with a freak car accident.

programme.title: Movie - Goli Soda - EP 1
programme.desc: Four adolescent boys fall prey of a baddie and things turn ugly.

programme.title: Movie - Panthrand - EP 1
programme.desc: While returning from a gang violence, twelve local gangsters are baffled to find a stranger in their van. His presence and actions evokes suspicion. What will happen next?

programme.title: Movie- The Great Indian Kitchen - EP 1
programme.desc: Post her marriage, a woman tries to fit into the conventional mould that society has prescribed for married women. But somewhere along the way, she starts feeling that this is not the life she wants.

programme.title: Movie- Kedikelam Kedi - EP 1
programme.desc: Seenu (Ram) is a street-smart guy who shifts to Hyderabad from Anakapally to complete his degree in a college. He falls in love with Sruthi (Hansika Motwani) who also attends the same college. Sruti is harassed by a goon Bhavani (Sonu Sood) who forces her to love him.

programme.title: Movie - Masooda - EP 1
programme.desc: The simple lives of Neelam, a single mother, and Nazia, her daughter, take a horrific turn when an evil force enters into their lives. The story revolves around how Gopi, their helpful neighbor, and Neelam face the odds and save Nazia.

programme.title: Movie - My Dear Bootham - EP 1
programme.desc: When a kid named Pannu finds a lantern in a cave, he opens it when he gets home and it releases the King of all Genies named Karkimuki. The genie helps the little boy with his problems of everyday life.

programme.title: Movie - Kather Basha Endra Muthuramalingam - EP 1
programme.desc: In Ramanathapuram district, where Nana, the powerful gangster, tries to take control of the village. Kathar is not ready to listen to him and refuses to make peace with them. Will both survive the battle or not?

programme.title: Movie - Mersal - EP 1
programme.desc: A police officer arrests a doctor for crimes targeting medical professionals but later finds the real culprit in a tale of revenge, corruption and magic.

programme.title: Movie - Raa Raa - EP 1
programme.desc: Raj Kiran (Sreekanth) is a film director, who is the son of a very successful filmmaker played by Giri Babu. Raj Kiran decides to follow his father's footsteps but all his films end up as disasters. Finally, his father invests his entire savings in one of his directorial ventures and dies of a heart break when that film flops as well.

A meeting that will upend her summer...

programme.desc: All the world's vegetables have come together with just one idea in mind: to find themselves on every plate and make every child love them. For that, they each pass before the judges and offer the very best of themselves, in the hope of being awarded the highest marks.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis - EP 7
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Ages - EP 6
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Super Plex - EP 6
programme.desc: Super Plex is no ordinary cucumber: he dreams of becoming a super-hero! And he's ready to do whatever it takes to achieve his aim, despite his not particularly practical oblong shape. With the help of friends as tenacious as himself, he confronts the challenges necessary to reach his objective.

programme.title: Sam & Julia - EP 11
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 31
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.desc: Thanks to the help and support of her friends, Kenda tackles all those little everyday problems with optimism. The children's adventures also offer them an opportunity to understand the importance of human values and the world that surrounds them.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard - EP 11
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: La Riviere A L'envers - EP 5
programme.desc: Hannah and Tomek have been joined by someone from the Perfumers' village: Marquis. A gentleman adventurer, he offers to lead them to Port Roham, the next step of their adventure, where they hope to find a boat.

programme.title: Pfffirates - EP 46
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. But it'll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: Movie - Arasu
programme.desc: Thirunavukkarasu, a gentle soul, takes up the job of handling the temple accounts in Agraharam. Soon, he shows his true identity and seeks revenge against a dangerous criminal who is out of jail.

programme.title: Movie - Kollaikkaran
programme.desc: Kuruvi, a thief, falls in love with Krishnaveni, who rejects him when she learns about his profession. His life turns for the worse when he is falsely accused of stealing a temple's jewel.

programme.title: Movie - Nanbanin Kadhali
programme.desc: Jeeva goes to Goa and falls in love with Sujata. Surya, his new roommate, also begins to woo Sujata. When Sujata responds, Surya rejects her. Surya has a secret that involves Jeeva.

programme.title: Movie - Nanbargal
programme.desc: Priya, an arrogant rich girl quarrels with Vijay in several instances. Later, she falls in love with him when he saves her from a danger. But, her father intends to break their relationship.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Pudhu Nilavu
programme.desc: Madan breaks his friendship with Anand because the latter likes the same girl he does. However, Madan is extremely shocked when he makes a discovery about Anand.

programme.title: Movie - Unnaruge Naan Erunthal
programme.desc: After her father's sudden death, Mahalakshmi is left to clear his debts and face the harsh villagers. A taxi driver helps her cremate her father and pledges his taxi to earn her a temporary reprieve.

programme.title: Movie - Sound Party
programme.desc: A landlord helps a girl become a doctor after she is forced to discontinue her studies due to monetary constraints. Soon, he falls in love with her. But around the same time, the village chief hatches a plan to get his son married to her.

programme.title: Movie - Captain
programme.desc: Kannayiram, a powerful gangster, kills Ramasamy for not giving up his land to him. After hearing this news, Shiva, Ramasamy's brother, flees the military camp to avenge his brother's death.

programme.title: Movie - Mundhanai Mudichu
programme.desc: Parimalam, a mischievous girl, falls in love with a widower who works as a teacher. She marries him by falsely accusing him of molesting her, but she has to take a drastic step to win his heart.

programme.title: Movie - Athu Oru Kana Kalam
programme.desc: When a truck driver realises that he's helping an escaped convict, he threatens to hand over Srinivasan to the cops. That's when the latter begins to narrate the circumstances that landed him in jail.

programme.title: Movie - Nanda Nanditha
programme.desc: Nanda (Hemachandran) is thrown out of his home by his drunkard dad. He falls in love with Nanditha (Meghna). He then agrees to kill a political candidate, Knockout Chandran (Shanmugaraja). Does he succeed in his job? Does he unite with Nanditha?

programme.title: Movie - Nathi Ondru Karai Moondru
programme.desc: Movie starring Sudhakar and Radhika directed by M.A.Thirumugam, music by M.S.Viswanathan

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 17
programme.desc: Mario Melchiot recalls his Premier League journey, which began as part of an ambitious Chelsea team. The Dutch defender played in the Blues' high-stakes final day clash in 2003 with Liverpool, before moving to Birmingham City and then captaining Wigan Athletic.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 34
programme.desc: Having arrived on these shores to manage Bournemouth in 2023, Andoni Iraola took over a club which had narrowly avoided relegation. Today, they are considered one of the toughest sides to play against in the Premier League. With exclusive access, this week the Bournemouth manager gives the Big Interview a guided tour of some of the local spots he likes to visit on the Dorset coastline.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 32
programme.desc: In a nail-biting climax to the 2011-2012 Premier League season, Manchester City clinched the title with unparalleled drama. Facing Queens Park Rangers on the final matchday, City secured a 3-2 victory with Sergio Aguero's iconic last-minute goal, securing their first league title in 44 years and etching that game into footballing folklore. They have since become the dominant power in English football and we look at how it all began.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Ziko Makengele vs. Mark Hulme
programme.desc: In this episode Mark Hulme takes on Ziko 'The Gorilla' Makengele for the World Welterweight Championship.

programme.title: WCCB Kim Clavel vs. Yesenia Gomez
programme.desc: In this episode, World Boxing Council (WBC) No. 1 contender Kim Clavel (15-0, 3 KOs) faces WBC Flyweight World Champion Yesenia Gomez (19-5-3, 6 KOs), who will defend her world title belt for the fifth time, at the Cabaret of Montreal Casino in Canada.

programme.title: Return to the Ring Rocky Gannon vs. Dominick Carter
programme.desc: Delivering the untold stories behind some of the most exciting fights in the sport, FIGHT SPORTS brings you 'Return to the Ring'. In this original documentary series, we sit with the participants from some of boxing's most interesting bouts, including the fighters, trainers, officials and promoters that contributed to each event.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Canelo Alvarez vs. Kermit Cintron
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Canelo Alvarez taking on Kermit Cintron in a bout that helped elevate Alvarez into the light middleweight title picture and take another step towards becoming one of the biggest names in boxing. Also on the card, action from a classic battle between Joel Casamayor and Michael Katsidis for the WBO Lightweight title.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3, from the Ryogoku Kokugikan Arena in Tokyo, Japan, features Chiyotairyu, Ryuden, Asanoyama and Takarafuji.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Shane Mosley vs. Ricardo Mayorga
programme.desc: This episode features Shane Mosley looking for a win against Ricardo Mayorga, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features two-time UFC champion and Hall of Famer Randy "The Natural" Couture and his buddies firing up their motorcycles for a good cause, plus an interview with one of MMA's biggest stars, "Rowdy" Ronda Rousey. We've got another installment of the gun store challenge this time with Thiago Alves, plus we go behind the scenes for a photo shoot with ring girl Arianny Celeste, exclusively on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Rusty Derouen
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector 'Macho' Camacho (46-3-0, 20 KO) battles Rusty Derouen (33-6-0, 25 KO) in a 10-round Halbmittel contest from Erie, Pennsylvania, USA.

programme.title: FS MMA Nick Agallar vs. Nardu Debrah
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Two Americans will engage in a lightweight battle for the next roster spot as Nardu Debrah of Brooklyn, NY and Nick Agallar of Milwaukee, WI square off in Costa Rica.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 10: California, USA - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Kajukenbo and the Martial Art of Hands, Feet and Throws with Masters Charles Gaylord and Greg Harper.

programme.title: WCCB Tina Rupprecht vs. Eri Matsuda
programme.desc: Ffrom Heidelberg, Germany, a championship tripleheader takes place headlined by Tina Rupprecht of Germany and Eri Matsuda of Japan competing for the WBC and WBO Women's Atomweight World Championships. Also on the card will be undefeated World Champion Sumire Yamanaka, also of Japan, defending the IBF Atomweight World Title against Fabiana Bytyqi. Rounding out the card will a European Heavyweight Title clash featuring Oleksandr Zakhozhyi against Arnold Gjergjaj.Only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Ricky Hatton
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather, Jr., in the final bout before his first retirement from boxing, facing Ricky Hatton in a superfight. Mayweather has referred to Hatton as one of the toughest competitors he has ever had to face. Also on the card, a young Saul (Canelo) Alvarez continues to rise in the rankings.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4, from the Ryogoku Kokugikan Arena in Tokyo, Japan, features Tokushoryu, Yutakayama, Asanoyama and Shodai.

programme.title: WCCB Live Janibek Alimkhanuly vs. Anauel Ngamissengue
programme.desc: LIVE April 5th, undefeated WBO and IBF Middleweight World Champion Janibek Alimkhanuly will look to defend his titles in his home country of Kazakhstan when he faces fellow undefeated middleweight Anauel Ngamissengue of France. Both fighters bring substantial power into the contest, with Janibek having won nine of his last ten bouts by stoppage, and Ngamissengue stopping six of his last seven.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 5

programme.title: Magda's Big National Health Check S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Magda explores the links between our physical and mental health. She uncovers the rising tide of mental health conditions, as the leading chronic disease amongst young people today. (Final)

programme.title: Alone Australia S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: As hunger, fatigue and cold take their toll, the remaining participants are forced to question why they're enduring the toughest challenge of their lives. For one, the reasons to stay are outweighed by the reasons to leave.

programme.title: Beyond Awesome S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: With malnutrition rates amongst the highest in the world, we go behind the scenes of a popular cooking show in Timor Leste that demonstrates how to create delicious and affordable protein-packed meals.

programme.title: The Pacific (2025) - EP 4
programme.desc: The Pacific investigates mistreatment of Fijian domestic workers in Tonga, and we speak to Cook Islands Prime Minister Mark Brown after he signed a controversial deal with China.

programme.title: The World (2025) - EP 52
programme.desc: Asian countries reeling after being hit hardest by Trump's "Liberation Day" tariffs, and Myanmar's military announce a temporary ceasefire as the death toll from the earthquake continues to climb. Plus the latest world news.

programme.title: News Breakfast (2025) - EP 68
programme.desc: Start your day with the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. James Glenday and Emma Rebellato bring you news and interviews, joined by Charles Brice, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2025) - EP 68
programme.desc: When you need to know what's going on in the morning, turn to Dan Bourchier for updated news and the latest from reporters out on the election campaign. Plus business, sport with Catherine Murphy and weather with Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2025) - EP 68
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Melissa Mackay presents the top stories and news as it unfolds with reporters on the campaign trail bringing you the latest on the election. Plus today's world news, business, sport and weather.

programme.title: Gardening Australia S36 - EP 5
programme.desc: Costa explores medicinal plants; Hannah health checks her worm farm; Millie visits a productive rental patch; a special guest follows the journey of a huge tree transplant; and we meet an artist working with native timbers.

programme.title: Built To Survive S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: In the heat and humidity of the rainforest Phil reveals the survival adaptations of the elusive tree kangaroo, the colourful cassowary and the lethal scrub python.

programme.title: This Place (2019) - EP 6
programme.desc: In Birpai country, the Gathang language is spoken. It has two words for river, "bila" and "dungang". The Hastings River is extremely important for the Birpai people, as it supplied plentiful food and a place to meet.

programme.title: One Plus One - The Elders (2023) - EP 1
programme.desc: June Oscar is a highly regarded Social Justice Commissioner advocating for First Nations people here and abroad. She shares her family's stories of resistance, her fight to stamp out alcohol abuse and making social change.

programme.title: The Pacific (2025) - EP 4
programme.desc: The Pacific investigates mistreatment of Fijian domestic workers in Tonga, and we speak to Cook Islands Prime Minister Mark Brown after he signed a controversial deal with China.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show S5 - EP 7
programme.desc: Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes are joined by Wests Tigers player and dancing sensation Sala Togatuki. We follow emerging players from the Canterbury Bulldogs on their passage to NRL, and talk Tuvalu Tennis with Alalilo Tepa.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing (2025) - EP 50
programme.desc: A daily wrap of everything you need to know in politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to experts on issues driving the news cycle ahead of the May 3 Election.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien (2025) - EP 50

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBCs Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBCs 'The Exchange' is the newsroom-based program for todays Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to todays markets and investors. CNBCs deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the days agenda. Airing CNBCs award-winning business news coverage, 'Power Lunch' delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBCs Scott Wapner, 'Closing Bell' guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, whats driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. 'Closing Bell: Overtime' takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrows trading day.

programme.title: Asia Squawk Box
programme.desc: Anchored by Martin Soong and Sri Jegarajah at the Singapore Exchange (SGX), 'Squawk Box' is CNBCs flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and opening of Asia's business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers.

programme.title: Europe Street Signs
programme.desc: One hour into Europes equity session, 'Street Signs' provides the street's view and a link to business stories trending online and on social. programme.title: Us Worldwide Exchange

programme.title: Us Squawk On The Street
programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, 'Squawk On The Street' tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. programme.title: Reality Trip

Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: I'M Still Here
programme.desc: Keiko Ogura, age 85, has spent her life talking to the world about her experiences as an A-bomb victim in Hiroshima. When she talks with Americans in a small college town, what does she discover?

programme.title: Time-Lapse Journey
programme.desc: Kamikochi is a beautiful mountainous region in Nagano Prefecture that's 1,500m above sea level. With a mirror-like pond and rime ice, see the frozen beauty of Kamikochi through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: Newsroom Tokyo
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Social entrepreneur Maeda Yosuke developed an innovative system that can turn wastewater into a water resource. We asked him about his vision and sustainable approach to solving water problems.

programme.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
programme.desc: The Kawanishi Dainenbutsu Kenbai dance tells the story of restless souls being guided to the Pure Land by the Buddha, in the form of a monkey. In 2022, it became UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: Airing Laundry
programme.desc: It's summer, and a group of women have gathered at the local well to do laundry in the shade. We learn about the different techniques and tools they used to wash and dry different types of kimonos.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: During World War II, a radio children's choir brought joy to its members and listeners alike. We uncovered the story of the teacher who led it, working to promote the cause of peace through music.

programme.title: The Masterpieces Of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode features ukiyo-e artist Sharaku's "The Actor Ichikawa Ebizo as Takemura Sadanoshin."

programme.title: Japanology Plus
programme.desc: Nicoleta Oprisan from Romania is highly skilled at ikebana, the Japanese art of flower arranging. In a Japanophiles interview, she speaks about ikebana's power to communicate without words.

programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Japan Railway Journal
programme.desc: In 2023, Japan Railway Journal showcased 10 tourist trains running throughout the country. Join us as we examine the results of an online poll about these trains.

programme.title: For Eagle Brothers - EP 14
programme.desc: A family story about five brothers and a sister-in-law who suddenly became the head of the family after her husband's unexpected death.

programme.title: The Best of Immortal Songs
programme.desc: The true classic of the century is born again! The legendary classic is reinterpreted by the best idol groups in Korea. Don't miss out on the heart-moving moments that transcend generations.

programme.title: The Seasons - EP 2
programme.desc: On a Friday night when a week starts and end, a talk show brings you music and stories that will "get rid of all your worries and all your concerns."

programme.title: Dali & Cocky Prince - EP 2
programme.desc: Price was never a concern for Dali, who was born rich. However, in an overnight, she is left with nothing due to her father's sudden death and bankruptcy. In front of Dali, who is struggling to save the museum that her father wanted to protect until the end, a man shows up, demanding her to pay off a debt of $2,000,000. And that man is Muhak, whom she mistakenly believed to be a big hand in the art world while she was working as a researcher in the Netherlands.

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles - EP 477
programme.desc: Foreigners, leaving their homelands behind, have come all the way to new country, South Korea. They chose South Korea not for sightseeing or short-term stay. But, they are here for various reasons, such as work, study or even marriage. The real stories of foreigners who challenge themselves to survive in Korean society will be unfolded!

programme.title: Catch that Spy - EP 3
programme.desc: The host leads the guests to challenge the game. The game is fun and full of wits. The good guys and spies fight for the prize money, and the suspenseful atmosphere brings the audience a new and different experience!

programme.title: Hello Doctor - EP 1428
programme.desc: The program invites doctors from different fields to talk about big and small things about doctors, break the stereotype of doctors and provide audiences with information on medical health from a relaxed and pleasant perspective!

programme.title: Travel Together - EP 481
programme.desc: A real-life working travel show, each trip is led by Dou Zhikong and Wang Chuan-yi, who are composed of a "handsome working group" of artist guests. They travel together to get away from the hustle and bustle of the city and explore the most healing rural secrets.

programme.title: Dee Girls Talk - EP 240
programme.desc: Hosted by Dee Hsu, the most queenly artist in the entertainment industry, and partnered with the humorous assistant host Patrick, each episode invites many of the most popular and topical artists and Internet celebrities to appear on the show. Through Dee Hsu Her profound and spicy hosting skills stirred up unparalleled "laughter" with the guests.

programme.title: No.57 Dream Boulevard - Reserve Your Dreams - EP 1673
programme.desc: More professional, richer, and more diversified car model information is shared with the audience.

programme.title: Miss Chill Chill - EP 36
programme.desc: Leave all the big and small matters in life to Miss Chill Chill. Let you understand most things in life with the coolest mood!

programme.title: All Star Quiz Show - EP 1003
programme.desc: The puzzle reality program, with the curator Sam Tseng as the knowledge gatekeeper, tests every artist star who comes to challenge the Jiugongge puzzle game. programme.desc: This as your health as the number 1 , all the 0 followed afterwards are all yours! But without health, without the number1, no matter how many 0 are added afterwards, it is still 0. "Xiaomai's Health Notes" specially collected all the easiest, most practical, cheapest and most efficient ways for all of you. A good day starts with "Xiaomai's Health Notes".

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride - EP 37
programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls 'father' is actually her real parents' enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey...

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride - EP 38

programme.title: Taxi Driver 2 - EP 15
programme.desc: The sequel continue to focus on the underground taxi company 'Rainbow Transfers' that offers a special 'revenge-call' services to its clients who have been wronged and helps them take revenge. Follow Do Ki's vengeful journey.

programme.title: Love Song in Winter - EP 25
programme.desc: Detective Jiang Chengyi (Huang Jingyu) and anesthesiologist Lu Yan (Sun Qian) unexpectedly reunite eight years after their breakup. Together, they solve a serial murder case, clear up misunderstandings, and rekindle their relationship.

programme.title: Love Song in Winter - EP 26
programme.desc: Detective Jiang Chengyi (Huang Jingyu) and anesthesiologist Lu Yan (Sun Qian) unexpectedly reunite eight years after their breakup. Together, they solve a serial murder case, clear up misunderstandings, and rekindle their relationship.

programme.title: Warm on A Cold Night - EP 4
programme.desc: Qian Kingdom's constable Su Jiu Er (Li Yi Tong) possesses a rabbit-like cold-skinned spirit. She meets wolf-like warm-spirited Han Zheng (Bi Wen Jun) from Qi Kingdom's ruling family. This unusual duo forms a close bond as they investigate a strange murder.

programme.title: Home Troopers - EP 9
programme.desc: All through the years, LAI KA-KA (Liza Wang) has been looking after her family so well that both her husband CHU KOT HO (Ha Yu) and her eldest son CHU KOT CHING (Kevin Cheng) look up to her as their temporal and spiritual leader. As KA is utterly resolute in her belief that she has got the best plans for her family, CHING has secretly invested in a domestic cleaning agency without consulting her, over which they have a terrible quarrel.

programme.title: Working Women - EP 3
programme.desc: "Working Women" relates the fantastic love stories of four very different women: Jane(Kenix Kwok), Lan(Mui Siu Wai), Lam(Lau Kam Ling ) and Man(Kong Yan Yin). _x000D__x000D_Janes husband On(Cheung Kwok Keung) had an affair with a crazy woman who nearly killed Jane. Lans hushand Cheung(Harrison Gabriel), on the other hand, tried to murder Lan for her insurance. Lams husband Tin(Ngai Chun Kit) was so obsessed with Lam that he maltreated her.

programme.title: Righteous Fists, The - EP 6
programme.desc: Rewind to the 1930s and Bo Ching-wan (Ruco Chan) and his family have come to crime infested Tong Yan Street in Bangkok. His father Bo Tin-ha tragically dies after he has teamed up with Lin Chun-shan to rebel against Lo Heung-tung. Ching-wans younger brother and sister have also accidentally gone missing. His mother Ting Sai-fung (Yuen Qiu) has become emotionally unstable.

programme.title: LEGEND OF THE CONDOR HEROES (III) - EP 5
programme.desc: TVBs across century billion-dollar production shows you the legend of a property giant._x000D__x000D_The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities.

programme.title: Blade Heart - EP 26
programme.desc: The Szema family murdered the Tong family in order to monopolize the weapons industry. Twenty years later, the chief of Brocade Guards, YUEMAN FUNG (CHENG SIU CHOW, ADAM), fights against MRS. WONG (WANG MING CHUN, LIZA) of the biggest escort carrier in town. During the fight, they realize they might know each other_x000D__x000D_ FUNG has changed his name, put on an eye patch and become a Brocade Guard. His wife, TONG PIK, has married WONG.

programme.title: LEGEND OF THE CONDOR HEROES (III) - EP 6
programme.desc: This costume Kung-fu packed serialized drama is an authenic adaptation of the most selling Kung -FU novel by the well renowned novelist KAM YUNG. This long series has been divided into 3 parts, each of these involved around individual story line and denotes a separate phase. Every part is complete in itself, yet, together they from a coherent whole.

programme.title: Man In Charge - EP 2
programme.desc: Master TAI YAU KUNG (Lau Ka Fai) is skilled in training official advisor for government. He helps his foster son CHOW PING (Ma Kwok Ming) obtain a job in officialdom. PING is a resourceful young man but he holds fast to his own beliefs. He finds all the rules and practices of the officials intolerable so he stays idle all the time. Sometimes he goes tavern to have fun and he falls into the adorable owner CHONG SIU HAN (Leila Tong).

programme.title: My Lover From The Planet Meow - EP 8
programme.desc: MIU MIU-MIU (Kristal Tin), originally from the Planet Meow, applies to live on Earth in a humanoid form to help solve the growing marriage problems between a physicist named SIT DING-KAP (Moses Chan) and CHIU YIU (Nancy Wu) so as to avoid the negative effects on her young master, SIT SZE-SZE (Celine Yeung). It turns out that, ten years ago, MIU-MIU took the appearance of a cat to be the pet of SIT's family and established a close bond with them.

programme.title: Born Rich - EP 8
programme.desc: Sophisticated banker CHEUK YAT YUEN (Lui Leung Wai) mistakes con artist SA FU LOI (Lo Ka Leung) for his half brother CHEUK YAT MING, fortuitously elevating the swindler to one of the leading figures in the banking industry. The lost and found brotherhood has blinded YUEN to FUs real nature and intentions. _x000D__x000D_YUEN is kidnapped overseas by a group of rioters. He undergoes a dramatic personality change after the incident.

programme.title: Born Rich - EP 9
programme.desc: Sophisticated banker CHEUK YAT YUEN (Lui Leung Wai) mistakes con artist SA FU LOI (Lo Ka Leung) for his half brother CHEUK YAT MING, fortuitously elevating the swindler to one of the leading figures in the banking industry. The lost and found brotherhood has blinded YUEN to FUs real nature and intentions. _x000D__x000D_YUEN is kidnapped overseas by a group of rioters. He undergoes a dramatic personality change after the incident.

programme.title: Captain Of Destiny - EP 6
programme.desc: While driving the police speedboat to hunt down a criminal, Cheung Chau police officer WONG TAI-MUI (Grace Chan) is accidentally caught in a waterspout and travels back in time two hundred years to the Qing Dynasty, where she encounters pirate CHEUNG PO-TSAI (Tony Hung) and the eleventh prince, MAN HO (Ruco Chan).

programme.title: Captain Of Destiny - EP 7
programme.desc: While driving the police speedboat to hunt down a criminal, Cheung Chau police officer WONG TAI-MUI (Grace Chan) is accidentally caught in a waterspout and travels back in time two hundred years to the Qing Dynasty, where she encounters pirate CHEUNG PO-TSAI (Tony Hung) and the eleventh prince, MAN HO (Ruco Chan).

programme.title: Painted Faces
programme.desc: This is based on the real-life story of Master Yu Jim Yuen who strives to run his academy in the 1960s, even as the opera culture is declining. Three young men, Sammo Hung, Jackie Chan and Yuen Biao, are determined to train under Master Yu and undergo extremely tough training before they become three of Hong Kong's biggest stars

programme.title: Protege de la Rose Noire
programme.desc: A legendary heroine Black Rose recruits two young girls, Gill and Sandy, as her successors. Both girls have proven to be courageous and righteous, and she trains them so that they can form the ultimate crime fighting force and become the new Black Roses!

programme.title: Troublesome Night 4
programme.desc: This horror comedy consists of four short stories about a group of Hong Kong tourists who travel to the Philippines and encounter a series of paranormal events.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: Ming is transferred to do menial police work ten months after the murder of Yan, in 2004. Meanwhile, a new star, Wing, has emerged in the police force and Ming suspects he is also a mole sent by the triad. Determined to start anew, Ming must kill Wing while ensuring his own identity does not get exposed.

programme.title: Happy Family
programme.desc: Sang, the only son of a rich family, falls in love with Kaka. They plan to get married, but Sang's father stops him from marrying her because she is his half-sister. Later, Sang falls in love with another girl who turns out to be his half-sister too. With Sang devastated, his mother unveils yet another big secret...

programme.title: My Dream Girl
programme.desc: Tycoon Cheung is back in China after being abroad for five years and finds his long-lost daughter, Ling, in a poor village. To transform his unrefined and dirty daughter into a lady, Cheung hires Joe as Ling's image consultant.

programme.title: Let's Have a Baby
programme.desc: De Sheng and Wan Jun have been married for years, but are unable to conceive. Wan Jun decides to undergo artificial insemination in the States and finally gets pregnant. She meets her cousin from the States who stays temporarily in their house with them, and De Sheng begins to suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Swindler Master Wong has cheated Pauline's father of his lifetime savings and Pauline vows to bring him to justice. On the way to find Wong, Pauline befriends a young conman and teams up with him to set up a perfect plot to scam Wong. Will their plan succeed and can she uphold justice in the end?

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In this prequel, the secrets of "Infernal Affairs" are revealed - the resentment between police superintendent Wong and crime boss Sam, as well as the beginning of the parallel fates of the two moles, Yan and Ming. The keys lie in the hands of Sam's wife, a ruthless kingpin and a righteous cop.

programme.title: The Death Curse
programme.desc: The medical scientist Tin distributes his inheritance among his eight children from different wives before he dies. Under the supervision of Lawyer Cheung, the eight siblings must gather and pray in their father's old haunted mansion every midnight, otherwise they will lose their right of inheritance.

programme.title: I Love Lolanto
programme.desc: Lolanto, a playboy, is injured and meets the daughter of a tycoon, Man, in the hospital. Man is mentally retarded and makes friends easily with Lolanto hence Man's father hires him to take care of her. However, as Man goes through treatments and recovers, her feelings for Lolanto also changes...

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Model from Hell
programme.desc: Anna, an exceptional student in a modelling school, becomes the target of envy from fellow models, who all die mysteriously when they want to harm her. It turns out that when Anna is upset, she undergoes a terrifying transformation and can wield lethal psychic power...

programme.title: Frugal Game
programme.desc: How do you overcome unemployment, divorce and crippling debt? Diana and Wai start a fake family to join a frugal game show on TV. To stimulate ratings, the producer forces the director, Tsui, to twist the game from an encouraging environment to a torturing one. As the fake family gets close to the prize, Tsui comes up with some bad ideas...

programme.title: My Wife is 18
programme.desc: Cheung, a dull thirty-year-old man, gets married in the UK to lovely YoYo, who is just eighteen, so as to fulfil their parents' wishes. Back in Hong Kong, their relationship is that of an assumed couple, as well as a teacher and student. With contradictions and funny incidents governing their relationship, the two gradually fall in love...

programme.title: Doubles Cause Troubles
programme.desc: Two squabbling cousins find themselves in more trouble than they can imagine after their tenant ends up dead. The gangsters and the police are both after them, and they have no idea what they have done wrong!

programme.title: Long Arm of the Law Part 3
programme.desc: Chinese ex-soldier Li is wrongly accused and seeks refuge in Hong Kong to escape a death sentence. En route, he meets Sam and Moon. While Li has fallen in love with Moon, Hong Kong triad kidnaps Moon and coerces Li into aiding a robbery. Meanwhile, the mainland police officer tracks Li's path to Hong Kong, intensifying the chase.

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: The Phantom Lover
programme.desc: In 1926 China, Sung, a talented singer, is deeply in love with To, a sweet innocent girl from a wealthy family. Their love evokes strong disapproval from To's father and bitter jealousy from her designated fiance, a young man chosen by her family. This is a story about a singer and a wealthy girl battling to be together in a traditional community.

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: Hong Kong tycoon Ren Da Kuan takes care of his family that spans four generations, yet his three sons grapple with their own challenges. Everything changes when his daughter returns from studying in France with her friend Roberto. Roberto brings a wave of transformation to the Ren family, sparking new hope and opportunities for all.

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair
programme.desc: As Wudang disciple Zhuo Yi Hang confronts the Demon Palace, he reunites with Lian Ni Shang, the woman who once saved him, and their love reignites. Lian, a disciple of the Demon Palace, endures torment to stay with Zhuo but is shattered when he accidentally injures her. A fierce battle between good and evil begins to unfold!

programme.title: Wonder Women
programme.desc: This is the story about a career woman and her friend going through life with their resilience and perseverance during the highs and lows of the Hong Kong economy over a decade, from the Handover in 1997 through 2007.

programme.title: Cop Shop Babes
programme.desc: Island East Police Station headed by Madam Lui is known for its "Cop Shop Babes" as all the officers there are female. Two police officers, Beer and Satay, apply for an internal transfer to this station in order to approach the girls. It is at this time that the police receives a bomb threat - can they resolve the case?

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quin's trust, Nick becomes his protege and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Casino Tycoon
programme.desc: Inspired by the story of Macau's Casino King Stanley Ho, the movie traces his blood-splattered fight to the top from 1930s to 1960s. In 1941, a young graduate, Benny Ho, flees Hong Kong during the Japanese invasion and heads for Macau. Benny starts as a labourer but rises to the top of the city's casino business with his courage, wisdom and diligence.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays an arrogant god in Heaven who is being punished for his pranks and mistakes. He is sent to Earth and reincarnate as Mad Monk to change the destiny of three misguided souls - a prostitute, a beggar and a villain. The Mad Monk needs to complete the task in three days in order to return to Heaven.

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh
programme.desc: When a young housewife's debt-ridden, philandering husband leaves her with a mountain of tax debts, a security guard is hired by the tax authority to guard the assets, but he starts falling for her instead.

programme.title: Love in a Fallen City
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name by the famous novelist Eileen Chang and directed by the equally acclaimed director Ann Hui, this romance story depicts the challenging relationship between an introverted Shanghai divorcee and a cynical Malaysian playboy during the Japanese invasion of Hong Kong in the 1940s. Will the lovers be together in the end?

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Liu serves his triad society loyally and tries to live a respectable life, but over time his good intentions lead him to an all-out gang war with a startling conclusion.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: Raw Passions
programme.desc: Mrs Lin's husband and his friend both have affairs with a belly dancer Sasa, and are both blackmailed by her. Sasa is stabbed one day and her brother shows up asking for money. A mysterious man also claims he can offer evidence for cash to help Lin's husband. Lin has to unveil the deceit, double-crosses and blackmailing before she is in danger too!

programme.title: The Trail of the Broken Blade
programme.desc: Chivalrous swordsman Fung goes in search of another swordsman on the run, Li Yue, in order to reunite him with his love. Though both men meet and end up being close friends, Li Yue did not reveal his true identity until Fung's life is endangered by a gang looking for revenge...

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordsman Long meets Feng while searching for his missing father and they soon fall in love and marry. When Long is kidnapped by 'Dragon Gate Palace' one day, Feng embarks on a rescue mission and reunites with Long, who manages to escape. Together, they confront the head of 'Dragon Gate Palace', and uncover a long-hidden secret.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: That Man In Chang-an
programme.desc: The Han Emperor dies and his Empress Lu seizes the ruling power. She plots to kill the heir to the throne, Liu Heng, but the masked warrior discovers her plot and tips off Liu. Liu sends his princess to Chang An to ask for help. The masked warrior protects the princess from attackers along the way and supports Liu to become the new Emperor.

programme.title: Apartment for Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies' youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fete. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servant's confusion, threatening the couple's union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A group of farmers who are being oppressed by the local magistrates kidnap one of the magistrate's daughter in the hope of being heard by the authorities. A wandering swordsman offers his help and aiding him are two fighters who have both switched sides from being the oppressors to the oppressed. The trio fight back against the magistrates!

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: 7-Man Army
programme.desc: This iconoclastic film retells the legend of seven Chinese patriots, who sacrificed their lives to defend against 20,000 Japanese soldiers and 50 tanks for 5 days, at a strategic key point of the Great Wall known as Pa Tou Lou Tzu.

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fang's fiance and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him...

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hon's pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brother's death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brother's Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang is trapped by seven seductive spider spirits who are hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing have to fight the spider spirits to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Hsieh Choun, the Black Dragon, is in trouble with the police since Wang Sien Tien's gang is helping them; he is no longer free to conduct his drugs shipments out of the port freely as he used to. He buys more thugs and killers to dispose of the young upstart, and soon Wang is in dire straits, in the port of Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: Flying Guillotine 2
programme.desc: In a time of anti-Manchu sentiment, Emperor Yong Zheng employs his ruthless Blood Hound Corps to silence any dissenters. Only one man and his signature weapon, The Flying Guillotine, stand in their way.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a General's daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: The Fastest Sword
programme.desc: Southern Swordsman Ting is named "The Fastest Sword" but is defeated by a street monk and has to fulfil his promise of working on stone craving with the monk for three years. Ting returns home to lead a peaceful life after that and declines all fight challenges. Even so, he is forced to fight the Northern Swordsman. Who will win finally?

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: Peter was a key dancer in a dance troupe and applied to be the chauffeur of a rich girl, Betty. When he is rumoured to be her lover, Betty is furious and goes undercover as a reporter to investigate the rumour. They fall in love in the process, and after putting Peter through many tests, they finally seal their love with a dance.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rong's hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read and filmed novel in Chinese history, this version is said to be the most successful one. Betty Loh's looks, demeanour and aura in her portrayal of Lin Dai Yu has won her the epithet "Classic Beauty".

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Lo's brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hu's house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hu's pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Citizens' Subjects
programme.desc: Citizens' Subjects utilizes the perspective of Taiwan people and Taiwan events to tell the stories of Taiwan. It takes a light-hearted, humorous approach to interpreting current affairs.

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: Global Focus
programme.desc: Bringing you the latest political, economy, information technology and breaking news around the world.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Atom Boyz
programme.desc: Atom Boyz II, Taiwan's most anticipated male reality talent show, features Ou Han-sheng, Hsieh Kun-Da, and Nine One One's Liao Jian-Jhih as celebrity mentors, with MuMu (Lin Wei-Ni) as the host. The 54 contestants are divided into six distinctively styled groups to compete fiercely against one another. How will they redefine the future of Taiwanese boy bands and become the next supergroup to take the Mandarin music scene by storm?

programme.desc: Hosted by Sam Tseng and Hsu Nai Lin, this top Taiwan variety show, splits celebrity guests into two teams to battle in various game segments.

programme.title: Storm Eye - EP 11
programme.desc: Chinese national security officers strive to protect the country's scarce resources and valuable technologies from being stolen by spies.

programme.title: S+PLUS - EP 5
programme.desc: S+PLUS blends "Street" and "Super," bringing together elite dancers from Taiwan, Japan, South Korea, Singapore, and beyond to compete for glory and a million-dollar prize! With top-tier judges and electrifying performances, this is the ultimate dance showdown you won't want to miss!

programme.title: The Ordinary Road - EP 9
programme.desc: It tells an inspirational story. Led by experienced seniors in the industry, a group of youngsters who have just started their careers are growing alongside each other and ultimately surpassing themselves through their strong belief, learning from one another.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go - EP 160
programme.desc: This large-scale variety show gathers showbiz entertainers to challenge each other in various hilarious educational games. Viewers at home are also encouraged to get in on the fun and try out the games with friends in real life!

programme.title: Storm Eye - EP 12
programme.desc: Chinese national security officers strive to protect the country's scarce resources and valuable technologies from being stolen by spies.

programme.title: Homemade Love Story - EP 25
programme.desc: At a boarding house called Samgwang Villa, three families from different worlds find themselves entangled through love, heartache and long-held secrets.

programme.title: Billionaire Story - EP 164
programme.desc: A street separates two worlds. On one side, there is a hard-working life in the market with both hardships and laughter; one the other, it's the life of rich and wealthy families who are intriguing and trembling.

programme.title: S+PLUS - EP 5
programme.desc: S+PLUS blends "Street" and "Super," bringing together elite dancers from Taiwan, Japan, South Korea, Singapore, and beyond to compete for glory and a million-dollar prize! With top-tier judges and electrifying performances, this is the ultimate dance showdown you won't want to miss!

programme.title: iWalker (World) - EP 2
programme.desc: Follow bold and witty hosts in hunting down the best gourmet and attractions around the world!

programme.title: Go! Go! Go! Operation C9 - EP 14
programme.desc: Agent C9 She Xiaojiao (Samantha Ko) lost contact with HQ due to an explosion, and led 4 years of quiet life with her husband Gao Dajin (Kenneth Ma). She has to start a dual life of wife and secret agent when her former partner B3 (Chris Lai) shows up suddenly.

programme.title: Homemade Love Story - EP 25
programme.desc: At a boarding house called Samgwang Villa, three families from different worlds find themselves entangled through love, heartache and long-held secrets.

programme.title: Ring A Bell - EP 4
programme.desc: A reality show where talented OST singers go head-to-head, captivating audiences with their renditions of beloved TV drama theme songs. Witness the power of music as they revive memories and strive to become the champion of the OST realm.

programme.title: Go! Go! Go! Operation C9 - EP 15
programme.desc: Agent C9 She Xiaojiao (Samantha Ko) lost contact with HQ due to an explosion, and led 4 years of quiet life with her husband Gao Dajin (Kenneth Ma). She has to start a dual life of wife and secret agent when her former partner B3 (Chris Lai) shows up suddenly.

programme.title: James' Going Places - EP 36
programme.desc: Join James, the host with outstanding culinary skills and an appetite for good food, as he explores markets and savours local delicacies in Taiwan!

programme.desc: The story follows Prince Murong Jinghe of the Dayan Kingdom (Liu Xueyi) and a young girl Mei Lin (Wu Jinyan), from Qingzhou, as they support each other through the tides of fate. They bravely defy destiny, risking their lives to break free and persevere.
